ComicInfo.Title: The Santa Clod; 13 Alternative Ways to Execute Someone on a Talk Show; Real Life Nature Tapes; Dumb and Dumber; If TV Cops Worked on the O. J. Case!; The Spring Break Problem/Solution Book of Inventions; Eternal Penpals Associates; How the Gingrinch Stole Congress!; Cracked Valentine's Day Cards; Retchie Retch; Fans Strike Back!; The Winter Exhibition at the Buffalo Museum of Art; One Day at Richie Rich's House; If Other Magazines Had Swimsuit Issues... Like Cracked; Chunior
ComicInfo.Summary: The heroes of 'NYPD Blue,' 'Columbo,' 'Perry Mason,' and 'Matlock' investigate the O. J. Simpson case.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:45:56. [Issue ID 250659]
